type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.java.JavaRuntime
type.description: * Represents a Java virtual machine installation. * * @since 2.11

method.name: getJavaHome
method.description: * The home directory of the Java runtime installation. * * @return The home directory. Never returns {@code null}. *

method.name: getJavaVersion
method.description: * * The Java version of the Java runtime installation. * * @return The Java version. Never returns {@code null}.

property.name: javaHome
property.description: * The home directory of the Java runtime installation. * * @return The home directory. Never returns {@code null}. *

property.name: javaVersion
property.description: * * The Java version of the Java runtime installation. * * @return The Java version. Never returns {@code null}.
